com.alien.rfid

Class LockFields

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alien.rfid.LockFields

  • public class LockFields
extends java.lang.Object
    Lock fields are used during the tag lock operations.
    See Also:
    RFIDReader.lock(LockFields, LockType, Mask, String)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ACCESS_PWD
      Access Password.
      static int EPC
      EPC (Electronic Product Code) memory bank.
      static int KILL_PWD
      Kill Password.
      static int USER
      USER memory bank.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LockFields(int fieldBitmap)
      Create a bitmap of fields to be used for tag locking operations.

      Return a bitmap of fields to be used for tag locking operations.

    • Field Detail

      • ACCESS_PWD

        public static final int ACCESS_PWD
        Access Password. It is used to protect tag memory from accessing. Access password is stored within the RESERVED memory bank.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KILL_PWD

        public static final int KILL_PWD
        Kill Password. It is used when killing a tag. Kill password is stored within the RESERVED memory bank.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EPC

        public static final int EPC
        EPC (Electronic Product Code) memory bank.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • USER

        public static final int USER
        USER memory bank.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • LockFields

        public LockFields(int fieldBitmap)
        Create a bitmap of fields to be used for tag locking operations.
        Parameters:
        fieldBitmap - a bitmap of memory fields to be locked. Multiple memory fields can be specified using the '|' operation.
        See Also:
        ACCESS_PWD, KILL_PWD, EPC, USER

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldBitmap

        public int getFieldBitmap()
        Return a bitmap of fields to be used for tag locking operations.
        Returns:
        bitmap of fields
        See Also:
        ACCESS_PWD, KILL_PWD, EPC, USER
